description.value:
Scarce Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. When consumed, use gains "Unnatural Speed" Trait for duration. Afterwards gain 1 Fatigue and make +0 Toughness Test or pass out for 1d10+5 minutes. Lasts 50+2d10 Minutes, causes 1d5 Corruption. Can only use one Eldar Drug at a time.

Requirements

Non-Eldar make -20 Toughness Test or are stunned for 1d5 Rounds, if 4+ DoF also take 1d10 Damage (ignore armour+toughness). Eldar make test if taking multiple Eldar drugs.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
